TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p ɹ ɪ s k ɔː s t eɪ l ɚ æ s t h ɚ t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ d iː z f ɹ ɪ ŋ z w ɪ v h ɚ w ɪ v f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s p uː n ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ f ɪ k s n æ p s ʌ v p ɹ uː t ɹ i z æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n ɪ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ɾ ɚ b ɑː b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d s m ɔː p ɹ ɛ ɾ ɪ s n ɪ k æ n ɐ p ɪ k t ɔːɹ f ɔː s f ɔːɹ ɾ ə k eɪ s ʃ iː k æ n s p uː t ð iː z f ɹ ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t uː t ɹ iː ɹ ɛ p æ s æ n d w iː w ɪ ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɚ ɹ ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ə t ɹ eɪ ŋ s t eɪ ʃ ə n

BAGS INCONTEXT: pæ-s
